title: What K-Pop Star Jackson Wang Can’t Live Without
text:
Nature Made Vitamin C Tablets

Working in the entertainment industry, there’s no nighttime, there’s no holiday, there’s no vacation, there’s no Monday, there’s no Sunday. There’s no specific time zone. There’s no lunchtime, sometimes. There’s no dinner. There’s just no time standard in this business, which means you’re going to have a weak immune system. For those who already have a weak immune system, you’ll get sick even more often. In order to be healthy, I need to have all the supplements that help maintain my good health. I take vitamin C every morning, but sometimes I’ll stop for like a week — I did my research, and it said that taking too many supplements is not really good for your liver. It’s always about the balance. For me, it’s nostril spray and then supplements, working out, sweating and detox-ing my body, and then sleep. I’m just trying to be healthy because I want to survive longer as an artist. I want to go longer, and in order to do that you need a good body and good health conditions.
description: We asked K-Pop star and Got7 member Jackson Wang about his favorite things, and he told us about his Nutribullet, JUST Water, vitamins, nasal spray, and his favorite soda, Pepsi.
